description:
Sherlock is a wonderfully brilliant series but its most impressive feat is that it constantly leaves fans wanting more.《神探夏洛克》是部很赞的剧，但是每年只出3集的安排让观众们一直处于欲求不满的状态。

Although fans will have to wait a while longer for Season 4, the Sherlock gods have smiled down upon us and will present a Victorian-era special hopefully later this year. At this time, PBS, which airs the series in the U.S., has not set a premiere date because the BBC has not yet set theirs. To that point, the network advertised the new special to reporters at the Television Critics Association fall previews on Saturday as "coming soon...ish."虽然《神探夏洛克》第四季让我们等待的时间比之前三季要长，不过剧组还是发了发慈悲，决定在今年晚些时候播出一集维多利亚特辑，让粉丝们以解相思之苦。这次，在美国买下《神探夏洛克》播出权的电视台PBS也没有办法确定这集特别集的开播时间，因为BBC电视台自己都还没有定好确定的开播时间。因此，在电视评论家协会上的秋季开播预告中，PBS只能预告说：“《神探夏洛克》即将回归...嘘。”

"I think we are all working to be as nimble as we can with this one," the producer said. "We are in very close touch with the BBC, and we are working very hard to not frustrate the fans..."制片人说：“我们都在把我们的灵感倾注在这部剧中，我们和BBC电视台有着很好的沟通，我们在很努力的创作，希望可以不要让粉丝们失望...”

title: 《神探夏洛克》第四季回归时间不定

description:
The former Deadwood lead will come on board Game of Thrones Season 6 is an unknown role, according to Entertainment Weekly.《娱乐周刊》报道，前《Deadwood》主演将会加入《权力的游戏》第六季，目前还没有向外公布这将会是个什么样的角色。

But the guessing games have already begun.不过外界已经纷纷开始猜测了。

EW confirms that McShane will only appear briefly, yet his role will be of "key importance."《娱乐周刊》确认McShane将会客串，但是戏份不多，但却是个非常重要的角色。

Might this be a reference to Sam’s dad, Randyll Tarly。大家猜测这个角色可能是Sam的爸爸，Randyll Tarly。

A recent HBO casting call mentioned the show is seeking an actor to play a "father".最近HBO的演员招募公告中，就提到正在寻找一位演”父亲“角色的演员。
